item.text: After Jesus called the twelve together, he gave them power and authority over all demons and to cure diseases,

<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> he <st data-num="649" class="">sent</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="649">out</st> to <st data-num="2784" class="">proclaim</st><n id="2" /> the <st data-num="932" class="">kingdom</st> of <st data-num="2316">God</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> to <st data-num="2390" class="">heal</st> the <st data-num="772">sick</st>.<n id="4" />

He<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3004">said</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “<st data-num="142">Take</st> <st data-num="3367" class="">nothing</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">for</st> your<n id="2" /> <st data-num="3598" class="">journey</st>—<st data-num="3383" class="">no</st> <st data-num="4464" class="">staff</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="3383" class="">no</st> <st data-num="4082" class="">bag</st>,<n id="4" /> <st data-num="3383" class="">no</st> <st data-num="740" class="">bread</st>, <st data-num="3383" class="">no</st> <st data-num="694" class="">money</st>, and do <st data-num="3383" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2192" class="">take</st> an <st data-num="1417" class="">extra</st> <st data-num="5509" class="">tunic</st>.<n id="5" />

<st data-num="3739" class="">Whatever</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3614" class="">house</st> you <st data-num="1525" class="">enter</st>, <st data-num="3306" class="">stay</st> <st data-num="1563" class="">there</st><n id="2" /> until you <st data-num="1831" class="">leave</st> the <st data-num="1564" class="">area</st>.<n id="3" />

<st data-num="3745" class="">Wherever</st><n id="1" /> they do <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1209" class="">receive</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>,<n id="2" /> as you <st data-num="1831" class="">leave</st> <st data-num="1565" class="">that</st> <st data-num="4172" class="">town</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="660" class="">shake</st> the <st data-num="2868" class="">dust</st> <st data-num="660">off</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="4228" class="">feet</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">as</st> a <st data-num="3142" class="">testimony</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">against</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>.”
Then they departed and went throughout the villages, proclaiming the good news and healing people everywhere.
Now Herod the tetrarch heard about everything that was happening, and he was thoroughly perplexed because some people were saying that John had been raised from the dead,

<st data-num="1161" class="">while</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">others</st> were saying <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> <st data-num="2243" class="">Elijah</st><n id="1" /> had <st data-num="5316" class="">appeared</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">and</st> still <st data-num="243" class="">others</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> <st data-num="5100">one</st> of the <st data-num="4396" class="">prophets</st> of <st data-num="744">long ago</st> had <st data-num="450" class="">risen</st>.<n id="2" />
Herod said, “I had John beheaded, but who is this about whom I hear such things?” So Herod wanted to learn about Jesus.
When the apostles returned, they told Jesus everything they had done. Then he took them with him and they withdrew privately to a town called Bethsaida.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> when the <st data-num="3793" class="">crowds</st> <st data-num="1097">found out</st>, they <st data-num="190" class="">followed</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>. He<n id="1" /> <st data-num="588" class="">welcomed</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, <st data-num="2980" class="">spoke</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="4012" class="">about</st> the <st data-num="932" class="">kingdom</st> of <st data-num="2316">God</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2390" class="">cured</st> those who <st data-num="5532" class="">needed</st> <st data-num="2322" class="">healing</st>.<n id="3" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">Now</st> the <st data-num="2250" class="">day</st> <st data-num="757" class="">began</st> to <st data-num="4334">draw to</st> a <st data-num="2827">close</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1161" class="">so</st><n id="2" /> the <st data-num="1427" class="">twelve</st> came and <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846">Jesus</st>,<n id="3" /> “<st data-num="630" class="">Send</st> the <st data-num="3793" class="">crowd</st> <st data-num="630">away</st>, <st data-num="2443" class="">so</st> they can <st data-num="4198" class="">go</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> the <st data-num="2945" class="">surrounding</st> <st data-num="2968" class="">villages</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="68" class="">countryside</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2147" class="">find</st> <st data-num="2646">lodging</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1979" class="">food</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> we <st data-num="1510">are</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> an <st data-num="2048" class="">isolated</st> <st data-num="5117" class="">place</st>.”<n id="5" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> he <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “You<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1325" class="">give</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> something to <st data-num="2068">eat</st>.” They<n id="2" /> <st data-num="3004" class="">replied</st>,<n id="3" /> “<st data-num="1473">We</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">have</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">no</st> <st data-num="4183">more</st> <st data-num="2228" class="">than</st> <st data-num="4002" class="">five</st> <st data-num="740" class="">loaves</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1417" class="">two</st> <st data-num="2486" class="">fish</st>—<st data-num="3385" class="">unless</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="1473" class="">we</st> <st data-num="4198" class="">go</st><n id="5" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="59" class="">buy</st> <st data-num="1033" class="">food</st><n id="6" /> <st data-num="1519" class="">for</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">these</st> <st data-num="2992" class="">people</st>.”

(<st data-num="1063">Now</st> <st data-num="5616" class="">about</st> <st data-num="4000">5,000</st> <st data-num="435" class="">men</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1510">were</st> there.)<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1161" class="">Then</st><n id="3" /> he <st data-num="3004">said</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="3101" class="">disciples</st>, “Have<n id="4" /> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="2625">sit down</st> in <st data-num="2828" class="">groups</st> of <st data-num="5616" class="">about</st> <st data-num="4004" class="">fifty</st> <st data-num="303" class="">each</st>.”
So they did as Jesus directed, and the people all sat down.
Then he took the five loaves and the two fish, and looking up to heaven he gave thanks and broke them. He gave them to the disciples to set before the crowd.
They all ate and were satisfied, and what was left over was picked up—twelve baskets of broken pieces.
Once when Jesus was praying by himself and his disciples were nearby, he asked them, “Who do the crowds say that I am?”

They<n id="1" /> <st data-num="611" class="">answered</st>,<n id="2" /> “<st data-num="2491">John</st> the <st data-num="910" class="">Baptist;</st> <st data-num="243" class="">others</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">say</st> <st data-num="2243" class="">Elijah;</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1161">and</st> still <st data-num="243" class="">others</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> <st data-num="5100">one</st> of the <st data-num="4396" class="">prophets</st> of <st data-num="744">long ago</st> has <st data-num="450" class="">risen</st>.”<n id="4" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">Then</st><n id="1" /> he <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “<st data-num="1161">But</st> <st data-num="5101" class="">who</st> do you <st data-num="3004" class="">say</st> that <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">am</st>?” <st data-num="4074" class="">Peter</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="611" class="">answered</st>,<n id="3" /> “The <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st><n id="4" /> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>.”

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> he <st data-num="2008" class="">forcefully</st> <st data-num="3853" class="">commanded</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="3367">not</st> to <st data-num="3004" class="">tell</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> to <st data-num="3367" class="">anyone</st>,<n id="2" />
saying, “The Son of Man must suffer many things and be rejected by the elders, chief priests, and experts in the law, and be killed, and on the third day be raised.”
Then he said to them all, “If anyone wants to become my follower, he must deny himself, take up his cross daily, and follow me.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">whoever</st> <st data-num="2309" class="">wants</st> to <st data-num="4982" class="">save</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="5590" class="">life</st><n id="1" /> will <st data-num="622" class="">lose</st> <st data-num="846" class="">it</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">whoever</st> <st data-num="622" class="">loses</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="5590" class="">life</st> <st data-num="1752">because of</st> <st data-num="1473">me</st><n id="3" /> will <st data-num="4982" class="">save</st> <st data-num="846" class="">it</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="5101" class="">what</st> does it <st data-num="5623" class="">benefit</st> a <st data-num="444" class="">person</st><n id="1" /> if he <st data-num="2770" class="">gains</st> the <st data-num="3650" class="">whole</st> <st data-num="2889" class="">world</st> <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> <st data-num="622" class="">loses</st> <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> <st data-num="2210" class="">forfeits</st> <st data-num="1438" class="">himself</st>?

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="302" class="">whoever</st> is <st data-num="1870" class="">ashamed</st><n id="1" /> of <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1699" class="">my</st> <st data-num="3056" class="">words</st>, the <st data-num="5207" class="">Son</st> of <st data-num="444" class="">Man</st> will be <st data-num="1870" class="">ashamed</st> of that person<n id="2" /> <st data-num="3752" class="">when</st> he <st data-num="2064" class="">comes</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="1391" class="">glory</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the glory<n id="3" /> of the <st data-num="3962" class="">Father</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> of the <st data-num="40" class="">holy</st> <st data-num="32" class="">angels</st>.
But I tell you most certainly, there are some standing here who will not experience death before they see the kingdom of God.”
Now about eight days after these sayings, Jesus took with him Peter, John, and James, and went up the mountain to pray.

<st data-num="1722">As</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="846" class="">he</st> was <st data-num="4336" class="">praying</st>,<n id="2" /> the <st data-num="1491" class="">appearance</st> of <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="4383" class="">face</st> was <st data-num="2087" class="">transformed</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="2441" class="">clothes</st> <st data-num="1823">became very bright</st>, a <st data-num="3022">brilliant white</st>.<n id="4" />

<st data-num="2532" class="">Then</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1417" class="">two</st> <st data-num="435" class="">men</st>, <st data-num="3475" class="">Moses</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2243" class="">Elijah</st>,<n id="2" /> began <st data-num="4814">talking with</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.<n id="3" />

They <st data-num="3708">appeared</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="1391">glorious splendor</st> and <st data-num="3004" class="">spoke</st> about <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="1841" class="">departure</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3739" class="">that</st> he was <st data-num="3195">about to</st> <st data-num="4137">carry out</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">at</st> <st data-num="2419" class="">Jerusalem</st>.<n id="3" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">Now</st> <st data-num="4074" class="">Peter</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> those <st data-num="4862" class="">with</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">were</st> <st data-num="916">quite</st> <st data-num="5258">sleepy</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> as they became <st data-num="1235">fully awake</st>,<n id="2" /> they <st data-num="1492" class="">saw</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="1391" class="">glory</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="1417" class="">two</st> <st data-num="435" class="">men</st> <st data-num="4921">standing with</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">Then</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1722">as</st> the <st data-num="846" class="">men</st><n id="2" /> were starting <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="1316" class="">leave</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="4074" class="">Peter</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st>, “<st data-num="1988">Master</st>, it <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="2570" class="">good</st> for <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> to <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> <st data-num="5602" class="">here</st>. Let us <st data-num="4160" class="">make</st> <st data-num="5140" class="">three</st> <st data-num="4633" class="">shelters</st>,<n id="4" /> <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> for <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> for <st data-num="3475" class="">Moses</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> for <st data-num="2243" class="">Elijah</st>”—<st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">knowing</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">what</st> he was <st data-num="3004" class="">saying</st>.

As<n id="1" /> he was <st data-num="3004" class="">saying</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st>, a <st data-num="3507" class="">cloud</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1096" class="">came</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1161" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1982" class="">overshadowed</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">and</st> they were <st data-num="5399" class="">afraid</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">as</st> <st data-num="846">they</st> <st data-num="1525" class="">entered</st> the <st data-num="3507" class="">cloud</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">Then</st><n id="1" /> a <st data-num="5456" class="">voice</st> <st data-num="1096" class="">came</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="3507" class="">cloud</st>, <st data-num="3004" class="">saying</st>, “<st data-num="1510" class="">This</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="5207" class="">Son</st>, my <st data-num="1586">Chosen One</st>.<n id="2" /> <st data-num="191" class="">Listen</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>!”<n id="3" />
After the voice had spoken, Jesus was found alone. So they kept silent and told no one at that time anything of what they had seen.
Now on the next day, when they had come down from the mountain, a large crowd met him.

<st data-num="2532" class="">Then</st><n id="1" /> a <st data-num="435" class="">man</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="3793" class="">crowd</st> <st data-num="994">cried out</st>,<n id="2" /> “<st data-num="1320">Teacher</st>, I <st data-num="1189" class="">beg</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> to <st data-num="1914">look at</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="5207" class="">son</st>—he <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="3439" class="">only</st> child!

A<n id="1" /> <st data-num="4151" class="">spirit</st> <st data-num="2983" class="">seizes</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> he <st data-num="1810" class="">suddenly</st> <st data-num="2896" class="">screams;</st><n id="2" /> it <st data-num="4682" class="">throws</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> into <st data-num="4682" class="">convulsions</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> causes <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> to <st data-num="876" class="">foam at the mouth</st>. It <st data-num="3424" class="">hardly ever</st> <st data-num="672" class="">leaves</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> alone, <st data-num="4937" class="">torturing</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="4937">severely</st>.

I<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1189" class="">begged</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="3101" class="">disciples</st> <st data-num="2443" class="">to</st> <st data-num="1544" class="">cast</st> <st data-num="846" class="">it</st> <st data-num="1544">out</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">but</st><n id="3" /> they <st data-num="1410" class="">could</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> do so.”<n id="4" />

<st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="611" class="">answered</st>,<n id="1" /> “<st data-num="5599">You</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="571" class="">unbelieving</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1294" class="">perverse</st> <st data-num="1074" class="">generation</st>! <st data-num="2193">How much</st> <st data-num="4219">longer</st><n id="4" /> must I <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">with</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="430" class="">endure</st><n id="5" /> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>?<n id="6" /> <st data-num="4317" class="">Bring</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="5207" class="">son</st> <st data-num="5602" class="">here</st>.”

<st data-num="2089">As</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="846" class="">boy</st><n id="2" /> was <st data-num="4334" class="">approaching</st>, <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="1140" class="">demon</st> <st data-num="4486" class="">threw</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> to the ground<n id="3" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4952">shook him with convulsions</st>.<n id="4" /> <st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="2008" class="">rebuked</st><n id="5" /> <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="169" class="">unclean</st><n id="6" /> <st data-num="4151" class="">spirit</st>, <st data-num="2390" class="">healed</st> <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="3816" class="">boy</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="591" class="">gave</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="591">back</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="3962" class="">father</st>.

Then they were all astonished at the mighty power of God.

But while the entire crowd was amazed at everything Jesus was doing, he said to his disciples,

“<st data-num="5087">Take</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">these</st> <st data-num="3056" class="">words</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="3775" class="">heart</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1063" class="">for</st> the <st data-num="5207" class="">Son</st> of <st data-num="444" class="">Man</st> is <st data-num="3195">going to</st> be <st data-num="3860" class="">betrayed</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> the <st data-num="5495" class="">hands</st> of <st data-num="444" class="">men</st>.”<n id="2" />
But they did not understand this statement; its meaning had been concealed from them, so that they could not grasp it. Yet they were afraid to ask him about this statement.
Now an argument started among the disciples as to which of them might be the greatest.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> when <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">discerned</st> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="2588" class="">innermost</st> <st data-num="1261" class="">thoughts</st>,<n id="1" /> he <st data-num="1949" class="">took</st> a <st data-num="3813" class="">child</st>, had <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="2476" class="">stand</st> <st data-num="3844" class="">by</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1438">his</st> <st data-num="3844" class="">side</st>,
and said to them, “Whoever welcomes this child in my name welcomes me, and whoever welcomes me welcomes the one who sent me, for the one who is least among you all is the one who is great.”
John answered, “Master, we saw someone casting out demons in your name, and we tried to stop him because he is not a disciple along with us.”
But Jesus said to him, “Do not stop him, for whoever is not against you is for you.”
Now when the days drew near for him to be taken up, Jesus set out resolutely to go to Jerusalem.

He<n id="1" /> <st data-num="649" class="">sent</st> <st data-num="32" class="">messengers</st> on <st data-num="4253" class="">ahead</st> of <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.<n id="2" /> As they <st data-num="4198" class="">went along</st>,<n id="3" /> they <st data-num="1525" class="">entered</st> a <st data-num="4541" class="">Samaritan</st> <st data-num="2968" class="">village</st> to <st data-num="2090">make things ready in advance</st><n id="4" /> for <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>,

<st data-num="2532" class="">but</st> the villagers<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3756" class="">refused</st> to <st data-num="1209" class="">welcome</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> <st data-num="846">he</st> <st data-num="1510">was</st> <st data-num="4383">determined</st> to <st data-num="4198" class="">go</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="2419" class="">Jerusalem</st>.<n id="3" />
Now when his disciples James and John saw this, they said, “Lord, do you want us to call fire to come down from heaven and consume them?”
<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> Jesus<n id="1" /> <st data-num="4762" class="">turned</st> and <st data-num="2008" class="">rebuked</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>,<n id="2" />
and they went on to another village.
As they were walking along the road, someone said to him, “I will follow you wherever you go.”

<st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="3004">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, “<st data-num="258">Foxes</st> <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> <st data-num="5454" class="">dens</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="4071" class="">birds</st> in the <st data-num="3772" class="">sky</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> <st data-num="2682" class="">nests</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> the <st data-num="5207" class="">Son</st> of <st data-num="444" class="">Man</st> <st data-num="2192" class="">has</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">no</st> <st data-num="4226" class="">place</st> to <st data-num="2827" class="">lay</st> his <st data-num="2776" class="">head</st>.”<n id="2" />

Jesus<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3004">said</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="2087" class="">another</st>, “<st data-num="190">Follow</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>.” <st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> he <st data-num="3004">replied</st>,<n id="2" /> “<st data-num="2962">Lord</st>, <st data-num="4413">first</st> <st data-num="2010" class="">let</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="565" class="">go</st> and <st data-num="2290" class="">bury</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="3962" class="">father</st>.”

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> Jesus<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, “<st data-num="863" class="">Let</st> the <st data-num="3498" class="">dead</st> <st data-num="2290" class="">bury</st> <st data-num="1438">their own</st> <st data-num="3498" class="">dead</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> as for <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, <st data-num="565" class="">go</st> and <st data-num="1229" class="">proclaim</st> the <st data-num="932" class="">kingdom</st> of <st data-num="2316">God</st>.”<n id="3" />

<st data-num="2532" class="">Yet</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2087" class="">another</st> <st data-num="3004">said</st>, “I will <st data-num="190" class="">follow</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> <st data-num="4413">first</st> <st data-num="2010" class="">let</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="657">say goodbye</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="3624" class="">family</st>.”<n id="2" />
Jesus said to him, “No one who puts his hand to the plow and looks back is fit for the kingdom of God.”
